record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - September 18, 2008)

[Page: S9042]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the following Finance Committee staff be granted the privilege of the floor during consideration of the tax bill: Mary Baker, Matthew Berkeley, Matt Kazan, Bridget Mallon, Katheena Mussa, Ford Porter, Sean Thomas, and Caroline Phil.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
